title: Paul Hogan celebrates his milestone birthday with his son Chance and his ex-wife Linda Kozlowski
text:
Paul Hogan celebrated his 80th birthday in Venice, California, on Tuesday.

The Australian actor marked his milestone birthday with his son Chance, 20, his ex-wife Linda Kozlowski and her new partner Moulay Hafid Baba.

The Crocodile Dundee star wore a leather jacket and jeans as the group traveled to dine at a sushi restaurant.

Hoges hits 80! Paul Hogan (right) celebrated his birthday with his son Chance (left) and his ex-wife Linda Kozlowski on Tuesday

He divorced with his wife of 23 years, Linda, in 2014.

The group drove together from Linda's nearby house to eat at a nearby sushi restaurant, where they marked the huge milestone for Paul.

The 80-year-old looked trendy in a pair of sunglasses and a leather jacket, with a checkered shirt, loose-fitting jeans and black sneakers.

Despite living in California for the last 16 years, Paul said he sent a 'message of love' back home to Australia.

Ex-wife Linda exuded California cool in sunglasses, a black top, jeans and Birkenstock sandals.

Young at heart: The 80-year-old looked trendy in a pair of sunglasses and a leather jacket, with a shirt, jeans and black sneakers

Family affair: The group drove together from Linda's nearby house to eat at a nearby sushi restaurant, where they marked the huge milestone for the Australian actor

Local chic: Ex-wife Linda exuded California cool in sunglasses, a black top, jeans and Birkenstock sandals

Chance walked side by side with his father, wearing black jeans, a T-shirt and a denim jacket with comfy Adidas Ultraboosts on feet.

The 20-year-old seemed to be occupied on his mobile phone as they walked to the restaurant.

After eating their sushi lunch, Paul drove his son back to Linda's house, where he stayed inside for a while.

Like father, like son! Chance walked side by side with his father, wearing black jeans, a T-shirt and a denim jacket with comfy Adidas Ultraboosts on feet

Not now dad! The 20-year-old seemed to be occupied on his mobile phone as they walked to the restaurant

While Paul relaxed inside, Linda, her partner and Chance looked at two multi-million dollar homes in the sought-after suburb of Venice nearby.

Since retiring from acting, Linda has made money by flipping properties for a profit.

Linda was Paul's second wife after he divorced his wife of 30 years Noelene Edwards in 1986.

Work doesn't stop! While Paul relaxed at Linda's house, she and Chance looked at two multi-million dollar homes in the sought-after suburb of Venice nearby

Buying and selling: Since retiring from acting, Linda has made money by flipping properties for a profit

The pair met while filming Crocodile Dundee, in which Linda played Paul's love interest Sue Charlton.

In 1999, Linda gave birth to their only son Chance. Paul has five more children with his first wife.

Earlier this month, a source close to the family told Woman's Day that Linda was begging Paul to quit smoking as he was getting older.

'Linda used to ride him for smoking in front of their child, and rightly so since Chance now smokes, too,' the source said.
description: Paul Hogan celebrated his 80th birthday in Venice, California, on Tuesday.
authors: Shive Prema For Daily Mail Australia
